nodes.text: Tohago was a human female who worked as an assistant, representative, and translator for the collector Dok-Ondar.

Tohago witnessed the crime boss Oga Garra shoot and kill her Wookiee lover Dhoran. When Dok-Ondar promised Hiro that he would look out for his Kowakian monkey-lizard LivLiv, Tohago spoke with the enforcer Varg, relaying the orders to him.
Tohago was able to speak multiple languages.
